name: Arcade Bowling Go
description:
If you are crazy about ball games or arcade games, you will be attracted by Arcade Bowling Go!

Arcade Bowling Go is a 3D ball game that full of challenges and fantastic rewards. Arcade Bowling Go keeps the characteristic of original arcade game, and has some new game feature with modern. Let’s start Arcade Bowling Go now, enjoy the ball carnival!

HOW TO PLAY
Swipe screen to launch the ball smarty in order to complete the target and get the highest score. Compare with other players around the world!
Tip: COMBO will get higher score

FEATURE
- 3 mode: Classic Mode, Career Mode and Boss Rush
- Lots of special balls are waiting for you
- Numbers of prize remind your childhood
- 3D scene & fantastic BGM & sound effects
- The most advanced ball physics and cool animations
- Hidden achievements wait for you to find
- Global Leaderboard

What are you waiting for? Arcade Bowling Go is available in App Store for FREE, jump into this gorgeous ball world and pop your way to get the highest score NOW!!!
